Package org.sd.util.thread

Interface Summary
FileProcessor Interface for processing a file.
Governable Interface for a governable runnable.
HookedRunnable A runnable with before and after execution hooks.
Killable Interface for a runnable object that can be killed.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFileProcessor Abstract implementation of the file processor interface.
BaseGovernable Convenience/reference implementation of the governable interface.
BlockingThreadPool A fixed thread pool that accepts runnables to execute when threads are available.
DirectoryMonitor Class to monitor a directory for new contents to process.
GovernableThread A specialized thread that runs and provides access to a Governable instance.
TimeLimitedThread Utility class to run a killable process until time runs out.
TimeLimitedThreadPool<T> Utility to execute tasks using a fixed thread pool, collecting those results that are generated within a time limit.
TimeLimitedThreadPool.ExecutionInfo<T> Container class for information collected during execution.
TimeoutThread Utility class to run an arbitrary process until time runs out.
UnitCounter Container and communications medium for counting units of work.
 

Enum Summary
Bucket Enumeration of bucket types.
GovernableThread.RunResult Enumeration of possible run results returned by the runFor and waitFor methods.
UnitCounter.Status
